CustomField.formula: CASE(StageName, 'Idea', 'Design', 'Evaluation', 'Design', 'Approval', 'Design', 'Planning', 'Design', 'Not Started', 'Implementation', 'In Progress', 'Implementation', 'Under Review', 'Implementation', 'Completed', 'Completed', 'On Hold', 'On Hold', 'Cancelled', 'Cancelled', '' )
CustomField.label: Phase
